page.title: 07ESSEX SHOW
page.content: Saturday 16th June 1985 Essex Show Day. I got out the car sensing the business and excitement of the day. There were people running here and there with horses,dogs and other animals.As I walked through the car park I could hear men shouting their wares.I could see the horses and foals in the judging ring as I got closer I could see that some of them had rosettes on their bridles. There were large white tents with livestock and their owners inside everybody busy enjoying themselves. The fairground was packed with people, amusements,a big wheel,ice cream vans and hamburger stalls trying to sell their food to passers by.Everybody enjoying themselves. Due to the recent rain there was mud everywhere, mud on shoes, mud on boots ,mud on push chairs, everywhere mud.
